name: Venser, the Sojourner
text: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.\n−1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn.\n−8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

name: Whitemane Lion
text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

name: Augury Owl
text: Flying\nWhen Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Coral Fighters
text: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

name: Minamo Sightbender
text: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

name: Mistmeadow Witch
text: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

name: Scroll Thief
text: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavor: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

name: Neurok Invisimancer
text: Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked.\nWhen Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

name: Slith Strider
text: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card.\nWhenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

name: Sky Spirit
text: Flying, first strike
flavor: "Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch."\n—Mirri of the Weatherlight

name: Wall of Denial
text: Defender, flying\nShroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

name: Galepowder Mage
text: Flying\nWhenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Kor Cartographer
text: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

name: Clone
text: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
flavor: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

name: Cryptic Annelid
text: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Primal Plasma
text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.
flavor: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

name: Sawtooth Loon
text: Flying\nWhen Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand.\nWhen Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

name: Cache Raiders
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: What the current doesn't take, they do.

name: Windreaver
text:
Flying
{W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn.
{W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn.
{U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

name: Jedit's Dragoons
text: Vigilance\nWhen Jedit's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavor: After Efrava was destroyed, the cat warriors scattered across Dominaria. Those who followed Jedit's example were strong enough to survive the ravages of apocalypse.

name: Sunblast Angel
text: Flying\nWhen Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.
flavor: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

name: Sphinx of Uthuun
text: Flying\nWhen Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

name: Path to Exile
text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Preordain
text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Sigil of Sleep
text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.
flavor: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

name: Revoke Existence
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor: "No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."\n—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

name: Angelic Shield
text: Creatures you control get +0/+1.\nSacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all."\n—Barrin, master wizard

name: Oblivion Ring
text: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent.\nWhen Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Safe Passage
text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.
flavor: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

name: Steel of the Godhead
text: Enchant creature\nAs long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)\nAs long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

name: Vanish into Memory
text: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor: Out of sight, into mind.

name: Overrule
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.
flavor: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.

name: Azorius Chancery
text: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.\n{T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

name: Flood Plain
text: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: New Benalia
text: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)\n{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

name: Sejiri Refuge
text: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

name: Soaring Seacliff
text: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.\n{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

name: Koth of the Hammer
text: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.\n−2: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Mountain you control.\n−5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

name: Plated Geopede
text: First strike\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: It prefers a cooked meal, so it will eat you now and lava-bask later.

name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
text: Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.\n{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: Do not judge a lizard by its size.\n—Ghitu proverb

name: Pilgrim's Eye
text: Flying\nWhen Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

name: Æther Membrane
text: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)\nWhenever Æther Membrane blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

name: Fiery Hellhound
text: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."\n—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

name: Vulshok Sorcerer
text: Haste\n{T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

name: Anger
text: Haste\nAs long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
flavor: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."\n—Koth of the Hammer

name: Cosi's Ravager
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.
flavor: "Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."\n—Zakken, Enclave cleric

name: Vulshok Berserker
text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

name: Bloodfire Kavu
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

name: Stone Giant
text: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.

name: Geyser Glider
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: "Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."\n—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Lithophage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.
flavor: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

name: Torchling
text:
{R}: Untap Torchling.
{R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able.
{R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling.
{1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Chartooth Cougar
text: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nMountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

name: Earth Servant
text: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.
flavor: "Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child."\n—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

name: Greater Stone Spirit
text: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.\n{2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
flavor: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

name: Bloodfire Colossus
text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

name: Armillary Sphere
text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Journeyer's Kite
text: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor: "From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life."\n—Noboru, master kitemaker

name: Vulshok Morningstar
text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Searing Blaze
text: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls.\nLandfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

name: Vulshok Battlegear
text: Equipped creature gets +3/+3.\nEquip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

name: Downhill Charge
text: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.\nTarget creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

name: Seismic Strike
text: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."\n—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

name: Spire Barrage
text: Spire Barrage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

name: Jaws of Stone
text: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.
flavor: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

name: Volley of Boulders
text: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.\nFlashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
